attributes.action: Regulate Booking Fees and Postage and Packing prices on advance Concert and Theatre Live Tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the years due to higher demand of live performances (eBay prices etc), all agents have set their booking fees higher and higher. Consumers are paying up to 30% or more of face value on tickets. This needs to be regulated in a smart way. 

If done wrong it will merely make booking agents charge more on P&P instead. It also appears that there is anti-competitive price fixing on these fees as all agents charge the same levels, which periodically have lifted over the years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
